title: Relates to immunity for certain employers providing information relating to a former employee to a prospective employer who is an elder care facility
summary: Provides civil immunity for certain employers who provide information relating to a former employee to a prospective employer, nursing home or elder care facility unless such information is knowingly false or misleading or violates a state or federal law; provides that if evidence is established that the information the former employer gave was knowingly false by such employer to the prospective employer about the former employee, a civil liability will be upheld.
